00020 #include <rdkcore/serialization_xml/xmlreader.h>
00021 #include <rdkcore/serialization_xml/xmlwriter.h>
00022 #include <rdkcore/serialization_binary/binaryreader.h>
00023 #include <rdkcore/serialization_binary/binarywriter.h>
00024 
00025 #include <rdkcore/object/objectmanager.h>
00026 #include <rdkcore/logging/logging.h>
00027 #define LOGGING_MODULE "test_all"
00028 #include <map>
00029 #include <string>
00030 
00031 using namespace std;
00032 using namespace RDK2;
00033 using namespace RDK2::Meta;
00034 using namespace RDK2::Serialization;
00035 using namespace RDK2::Serialization::Xml;
00036 using namespace RDK2::Serialization::Binary;
00037 
00038 int main()
00039 {
00040     XmlWriter xw(true); XmlReader xr;
00041     BinaryReader br; BinaryWriter bw(true);
00042     
00043     bool failed = false;
00044 
00045     Class2prot& class2prot = getClass2prot();   
00046     Class2prot::iterator it;
00047     for(it=class2prot.begin();it!=class2prot.end();++it) {
00048         cstr className = it->first;
00049         RDK_INFO_STREAM("Name " << className);
00050         
00051         Object * o = forName(className);
00052         
00053         std::vector<Object*> v = o->getTestCases();
00054         if(v.size()==0) {
00055             RDK_DEBUG_STREAM("No test cases for " << className);
00056             continue;
00057         }
00058         std::vector<Object*>::iterator it;
00059         
00060         if(v.size()>=2) {
00061             Object * o1 = v[0];
00062             Object * o2 = v[1];
00063             if(o1->equals(o2)) {
00064                 RDK_ERROR_STREAM(className << ": equal test-cases??");
00065                 failed = true;              
00066             }
00067         }
00068         
00069         for(it=v.begin();it!=v.end();++it) {
00070             Object * o = *it;
00071             
00072             if(!o->equals(o)) {
00073                 RDK_ERROR_STREAM(className << ": relation equals() is not reflective");
00074                 failed = true;
00075             }
00076 
00077             string xml;
00078             try {
00079                 xml = xw.serialize(true,o);
00080                 Object * o2 = (Object*) xr.deserialize(xml);
00081                 if(!o->equals(o2)) {
00082                     RDK_ERROR_STREAM(className << ": could not serialize/deserialize XML");
00083                     failed = true;
00084                 }
00085                 
00086                 if(o->equals(o2) && !o2->equals(o)) {
00087                     RDK_ERROR_STREAM(className << ": equals is not symmetric");
00088                     failed = true;
00089                 }
00090             } catch(exception &e) {
00091                 RDK_ERROR_STREAM(className << ": bad xml serialization"
00092                     << ": " << e.what());
00093                 failed = true;
00094             } catch(...) {
00095                 RDK_ERROR_STREAM(className << ": Unknown exception");
00096                 failed = true;
00097             }
00098 
00099             try {
00100                 string bin = bw.serialize(true,o);
00101                 Object * o2 = (Object*) br.deserialize(bin);
00102                 if(!o->equals(o2)) {
00103                     string xml2 = xw.serialize(true, o2);
00104                     RDK_ERROR_STREAM(className << ": could not serialize/deserialize binary. XML1: \n" << xml << "XML2:\n" << xml2);
00105                     failed = true;
00106                 }
00107                 
00108                 if(o->equals(o2) && !o2->equals(o)) {
00109                     RDK_ERROR_STREAM(className << ": equals is not symmetric: \n" << xml);
00110                     failed = true;
00111                 }
00112                 
00113             } catch(exception &e) {
00114                 RDK_ERROR_STREAM(className << ": bad xml serialization"
00115                     << ": " << e.what());
00116                 failed = true;
00117             } catch(...) {
00118                 RDK_ERROR_STREAM(className << ": Unknown exception");
00119                 failed = true;
00120             }
00121 
00122         }
00123         
00124     }
00125     
00126     return failed ? -1 : 0;
00127 }
